title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again
description: When importing an image and then attempting to refresh it by importing the same image again, the image is not being updated.
OB: The imported image remains the same, even after importing the image again.
EB: The imported image should be refreshed and updated to the latest version after importing the image again.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:

1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into layout view.
2. Delete this image file from the outline image.
3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'.
4. Try re-importing 'image1.jpg' into the layout view.

Expectation: The newly imported image should replace the old image and be displayed in the layout view.
